PackageOracle.name: DA_BUS_INTERACT_PARTY_ROLE
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_BUS_INTERACT_PARTY_ROLE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.43.011512000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,bus_interact_id IN NUMBER
,party_id IN NUMBER
,party_role_cd IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,source_system_party_id IN VARCHAR2
,bus_interact_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,effective_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,bus_interact_id IN NUMBER
,party_id IN NUMBER
,party_role_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_bus_interact_party_role;

body.name: DA_BUS_INTERACT_PARTY_ROLE
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_BUS_INTERACT_PARTY_ROLE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.43.021833000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,bus_interact_id IN NUMBER
,party_id IN NUMBER
,party_role_cd IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,source_system_party_id IN VARCHAR2
,bus_interact_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,effective_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_bus_interact_party_role.add, parms=' || bus_interact_id || '|' || party_id || '|' || party_role_cd || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || source_system_party_id || '|' || bus_interact_type_cd || '|' || effective_dttm || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_bus_interact_party_role a
(
a.bus_interact_id
,a.party_id
,a.party_role_cd
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.source_system_party_id
,a.bus_interact_type_cd
,a.effective_dttm
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.bus_interact_id
,add.party_id
,add.party_role_cd
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.source_system_party_id
,add.bus_interact_type_cd
,add.effective_dttm
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_bus_interact_party_role.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,bus_interact_id IN NUMBER
,party_id IN NUMBER
,party_role_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_bus_interact_party_role.del, parms=' || bus_interact_id || '|' || party_id || '|' || party_role_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_bus_interact_party_role a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.bus_interact_id = del.bus_interact_id
AND a.party_id = del.party_id
AND a.party_role_cd = del.party_role_cd
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_bus_interact_party_role.del');

END del;

END da_bus_interact_party_role;
